text: Doug Somers (real name Douglas Duane Somerson; September 22, 1951 â€“ May 16, 2017) was an American professional wrestler. He was born in Minneapolis, Minnesota. He was known by his ring name "Pretty Boy" Doug Somers. He worked in the American Wrestling Association (AWA) in the mid-1980s as part of a tag team with "Playboy" Buddy Rose, managed by Sherri Martel. Somers died on May 16, 2017 at the age of 65. ==References== ==Other websites== *Online World Of Wrestling Profile Category:1951 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Sportspeople from Minneapolis
title: Doug Somers
